医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
西奈山研究人员确定了一种特殊红细胞转运蛋白的结构西奈山伊坎医学院的研究人员已经确定了红细胞中发现的特殊转运蛋白的结构及其与药物的相互作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Mount-Sinai-researchers-identify-the-struct-of-a-special-red-blood-cell-transporter.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Mount-Sinai-researchers-identify-the-struct-of-a-special-red-blood-cell-transporter.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=debd11af-4abc-4a6b-b161-e9c03904d1a9 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:58:00 -0400 Mount Sinai researchers identify the structure of a special red blood cell transporter
研究表明性行为如何随着年龄而变化今天发表的一项新研究表明，随着年龄的增长，我们的性伴侣数量会发生变化，并且有一些令人惊讶的结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Study-shows-how- Sex-behaviors-change-with-age.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Study-shows-how- Sex-behaviors-change-with-age.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=612b8b4c-81fc-4e1b-8193-b659fd875a6f Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:52:00 -0400 Study shows how sexual behaviors change with age
临床前研究为首次临床膀胱移植做准备提供了重要的第一步据美国泌尿外科协会 (AUA) 官方期刊 The Journal of Urology® 10 月号报道，一系列临床前研究为开发人类机器人膀胱移植技术迈出了重要的第一步。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Bladder-Transplantation-In-Humans-Initial-Studies-To-Develop-Technique.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Bladder-Transplantation-In-Humans-Initial-Studies-To-Develop-Technique.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96a2b45c-46b0-430a-b9ec-0de0b97386dd Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:47:00 -0400 Pre-clinical studies provide important first steps to prepare for first clinical bladder transplant
使用生物电子设备捕获和释放肿瘤细胞在题为《癌症诊断微流体系统》的书中，UPV/EHU 的微流体集群小组描述了构建生物电子设备的过程，该设备由涂有智能聚合物的金电极组成，能够以非侵入性、可控的方式捕获和释放细胞，同时进行监测使用传统电气测量的过程。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Capture-and-release-of-tumor-cells-using-a-bioelectric-device.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Capture-and-release-of-tumor-cells-using-a-bioelectric-device.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=466812ef-a839-4345-90a1-00623982ecb5 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:32:42 -0400 Capture and release of tumor cells using a bioelectronic device
研究显示，妊娠期糖尿病之后的 2 型糖尿病存在严重的种族和民族不平等哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼学院流行病学副教授、流行病学家 Teresa Janevic 博士的一项新研究表明，妊娠期糖尿病后，糖尿病中的种​​族和族裔不平等现象已经确立，但这些不平等现象相当严重，并且一直是孕产妇健康公平性中被忽视的一个方面。公共卫生。迄今为止，关于妊娠期糖尿病 (GDM) 后 2 型糖尿病的种族和民族差异的研究还很有限。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Racial-and-ethnic-inequities-are-substantial-in-type-2-diabetes-after-gestational-diabetes-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Racial-and-ethnic-inequities-are-substantial-in-type-2-diabetes-after-gestational-diabetes-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4a787a51-b926-4972-9b1c-caa66da02d48 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 15:28:00 -0400 Racial and ethnic inequities are substantial in type 2 diabetes after gestational diabetes, study shows
运动诱导的激素鸢尾素在β淀粉样蛋白减少中的作用研究人员探索了运动诱导的鸢尾素减轻阿尔茨海默病中β-淀粉样蛋白病理的生物学机制。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/The-role-of-exercise-induced-hormone-irisin-in-amyloid-beta-reduction.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/The-role-of-exercise-induced-hormone-irisin-in-amyloid-beta-reduction.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6e9756a6-22e0-4477-b560-bb6d049d9c30 Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:58:00 -0400 The role of exercise-induced hormone irisin in amyloid beta reduction
MASLD患者的一级亲属患肝脏相关疾病的风险较高根据瑞典卡罗林斯卡学院在《肝脏病学杂志》上发表的一项国家研究，代谢相关脂肪肝患者的近亲患肝癌和死于肝脏相关疾病的风险更高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/First- Degree-relatives-of-病人-with-MASLD-have-higher-risk-of-developmenting-liver-lated-diseases.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/First- Degree-relatives-of-病人-with-MASLD-have-higher-risk-of-developmenting-liver-lated-diseases.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2fa24e8c-1550-4cba-afc1-a1b139fcd85e Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:47:28 -0400 First-degree relatives of patients with MASLD have higher risk of developing liver-related diseases
UTSA 研究人员研究 Sweet Annie 药用化合物的作用机制在瓦莱丽·斯彭塞尔 (Valerie Sponsel) 的 UTSA 生物实验室里，整齐地摆放在两排陶土花盆中的高大芳香植物中长出了充满活力的绿叶。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/UTSA-researchers-study-the-mechanism-of-action-of-Sweet-Annies-medicinal-compounds.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/UTSA-researchers-study-the-mechanism-of-action-of-Sweet-Annies-medicinal-compounds.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c82d5bb0-d3d5-4b0d-9f1a-e5aaaa7ebabd Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:38:37 -0400 UTSA researchers study the mechanism of action of Sweet Annie's medicinal compounds
Senolytic 治疗轻度阿尔茨海默病的 I 期试验显示安全性研究人员对有症状和早期阿尔茨海默病 (AD) 患者进行了口服 senolytic 疗法的 1 期试验，该疗法包含槲皮素 (Q) 和达沙替尼 (D)。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Senolytic-therapy-in-mild-Alzheimere28099s-disease-shows-safety-in-phase-I-Trial.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Senolytic-therapy-in-mild-Alzheimere28099s-disease-shows-safety-in-phase-I-Trial.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=47c55ca2-1767-4b08-ba3b-3e25d1d4121e Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:34:00 -0400 Senolytic therapy in mild Alzheimer’s disease shows safety in phase I trial
有希望的新宫颈癌检测填补了巴氏试验所遗漏的空白研究人员评估了一种新型人乳头瘤病毒 (HPV) 和宿主脱氧核糖核酸 (DNA) 甲基化评分，用于原位腺癌 (AIS) 和宫颈腺癌 (ADC) 筛查。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Promising-new-cervical-cancer-test-fills-in-the-gap-missed-by-P​​ap-tests.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230908/Promising-new-cervical-cancer-test-fills-in-the-gap-missed-by-P​​ap-tests.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a7814bec-ad9a-497a-8fc9-4be32c631fee Fri, 08 Sep 2023 10:16:00 -0400 Promising new cervical cancer test fills in the gap missed by Pap tests
